arguments.value: The note has been already spent

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The note has been already spent"

documentation.text:
@dev Withdraw a deposit made on origin chain to the . `proof` is a zkSNARK proof data, and input is an array of circuit public inputs
`input` array consists of:
- merkle root of all deposits in the contract
- hash of unique deposit nullifier to prevent double spends
- the recipient of funds
- optional fee that goes to the transaction sender (usually a relay)

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Incorrect refund amount received by the contract"

arguments.value: Incorrect refund amount received by the contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Incorrect refund amount received by the contract"

documentation.text: @dev Whether the root is present in the root history
